Hybridisation Recombination and Introgression Detection and Dating

Easy detection, dating, and visualisation for recombination, introgression and hybridisation events in genomes.

HybRIDS

Analyse sequences for potential recombination blocks

HybRIDS is An R package for easy detection and dating, and visualisation of recombination, introgression and hybridisation events in genomes.

It currently runs in R as an addon package and is open-source, free software.

Get Started


Developed in parallel with research and scientists at the Norwich Research Park

The Earth and Life Systems Alliance is a strategic cornerstone of the Norwich Research Park (NRP), with members collaborating across the many laboratories and groups. with an interdisciplinary approach to addressing the challenges of a changing climate, the Alliance not only carries out fundamental research but also applies the findings to real world scenarios.

ELSA Website
